SourceAnalyzer.Name: Parameter Verification Rules
SourceAnalyzer.Description: Validates that parameters are verified using the Param class.

Rule.Name: ParametersMustBeVerified
Rule.Context: The parameter '{0}' is not verified using the Param class.

Rule.Name: OutParametersMustNotBeVerified
Rule.Context: Out parameters do not need to be verified: '{0}'.

Rule.Name: PrivateMethodsMustUseAsserts
Rule.Context: Methods with private or internal visibility should use Param.Assert... rather than Param.Require...

Rule.Name: PublicMethodsMustUseRequires
Rule.Context: Methods with public or protected visibility should use Param.Require... rather than Param.Assert...
